author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Gemdale's 2017 Net Profit Up 8.6 Percent Y/Y At 6.8 Billion Yuan
text:
(Refiles with additional bullet point and link)
April 17 (Reuters) - Gemdale Corp:
* SAYS 2017 NET PROFIT UP 8.6 PERCENT Y/Y AT 6.8 BILLION YUAN ($1.08 billion)
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE UP TO 15 BLN YUAN DEBT FINANCING INSTRUMENTS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2vmC82p ; bit.ly/2vkoT2v Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2818 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
